## ts-utils package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get(obj, path, defaultValue)](./ts-utils.get.md) | Gets the value at path of object. |
|  [isArrayOf(types, value)](./ts-utils.isarrayof.md) | Returns true if the value is an array of one or more given types. |
|  [isTableOf(types, value)](./ts-utils.istableof.md) | Returns true if the value is a table (i.e. a 2D array) of one or more given types. |
|  [parseBoolean(value)](./ts-utils.parseboolean.md) | Tries to parse a <code>boolean</code> from a given character string and throws an error if it can't. |
|  [recordEntries(record)](./ts-utils.recordentries.md) | Returns an array of key/values of the enumerable properties of an object. |
|  [tryParseBoolean(value)](./ts-utils.tryparseboolean.md) | Tries to parse a <code>boolean</code> from a given character string and returns <code>undefined</code> if it can't. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ValueOrArray](./ts-utils.valueorarray.md) | A generic type which can be a single value or a recursive array of itself. |
